title: Aged sirloin steak with Thai salad and toasted hazelnuts
description: This steak recipe works as a quick and easy midweek supper or a dinner party main. If you'd rather not use an aged sirloin steak, one that hasn't been aged will work well, too.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 Asian pear, peeled and finely chopped
½ coconut, ¼ shaved, ¼ grated
